post:
Bacloud.com - OWN data center operator in Lithuania, Europe

**Configure servers follow your needs! SAVE 17% on annual payments! Remove second drive/SSD and save over $6/month! **

Additional discount LET members, E3v6S and E3v6G servers 7% discount with 1 and 3 months payments, code "LETdedicated"

> BaCloud-Basic
> [1 x] Intel® Atom D2700 2 cores/4threads,	4 GB RAM DDR3, 2 x 120GB SSD or 2 x 1TB HDD 100 Mbps unlimited - $24.41  ( $17.18 with 1 x SSD or 1 x HDD ) ( [Order page](https://www.bacloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=96) )

More HDD/SSD options available in order link.
